entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 10:29PM AKST until February 15 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...NEXT WEATHER FRONT WITH SNOW TO IMPACT SOUTHEAST TUESDAY NIGHT AND WEDNESDAY... .Moist warm air overrunning the cooler air in place in the northern and central panhandle, will result in snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Most favorable locations for the higher snowfall accumulations are over the Icy Strait Corridor to Juneau.
